markdown.content: Hello! If you are following me, I suggest unfollowing me. I mostly ~~boost~~ wrong terminology I mean share/rechost/rebug/whatever.js. I have been away from cohost for a while, so if I spam your homepage, I'm sorry, I try to only share the most interesting ones but it can be a lot of posts, and just unfollow me lmao I will not know (because cohost not alerting unfollow is the best) and even if I do know I literally do not care lol.
